message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $100. This is a very fair price considering the value you'll gain.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
